data.text: I received this message from Yahweh about Babylonia, a land that is near the Persian Gulf but which will soon be a desert.
Yahweh showed me a terrifying vision.
Because of that, my body is full of pain;
I cannot think straight/correctly, and I tremble.
In the vision I saw that the leaders of Babylonia were preparing a great feast.
Tell him to watch for chariots pulled by pairs of horses,
So I did that, and one day the watchman called out,
Now, I saw a man riding in a chariot pulled by two horses.
My people in Judah, the army of Babylon has caused you to suffer greatly
I received this message from Yahweh about Edom:
I received this message about Arabia:
And you people who live in Tema city in northwest Arabia,
They are fleeing in order not to be killed by their enemiesâ€™ swords
Only a few of their soldiers who know well how to shoot arrows will remain alive.
